import { useContext } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { UserContext } from '../../App' import RecipeForm from '../recipes/RecipeForm' function Recipe({name, steps, ingredients, cookbooks}) { const route = useParams() return ( <> { route.id ?
